# <a name="import-contacts"></a><span data-ttu-id="65362-102">匯入連絡人</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65362-102">Import contacts</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="65362-103">將連絡人匯入 Outlook.com 之前，您必須將其從其他電子郵件提供者匯出為 .csv 檔案。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65362-103">Before importing contacts to Outlook.com, you'll need to export them from your other email provider as a .csv file.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="65362-104">然後，遵循下列指示。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65362-104">Then, follow the instructions below.</span></span>
  
1. <span data-ttu-id="65362-105">移至 [人員](https://outlook.live.com/people/)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65362-105">Go to [People](https://outlook.live.com/people/)</span></span> <img src='data:image/png;base64,' />
<span data-ttu-id="65362-106">.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65362-106">.</span></span>
2. <span data-ttu-id="65362-107">在頁面頂端，選取 [管理匯**Manage** \> **入連絡人**]。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65362-107">At the top of the page, select **Manage** \> **Import contacts**.</span></span>
3. <span data-ttu-id="65362-108">選取 **[流覽]**，流覽至您儲存匯出的連絡人所在的資料夾，然後選取 [ **開啟**]。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65362-108">Select **Browse**, navigate to the folder where you saved your exported contacts, and select **Open**.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="65362-109">若要深入瞭解，請參閱 [將連絡人匯入 Outlook.com](https://support.office.com/article/285a3b55-8d93-4ac8-93df-43fffd13b2f1?wt.mc_id=Office_Outlook_com_Alchemy)。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65362-109">To learn more, see [Import contacts to Outlook.com](https://support.office.com/article/285a3b55-8d93-4ac8-93df-43fffd13b2f1?wt.mc_id=Office_Outlook_com_Alchemy).</span></span>
